ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: our activities are in the field of education, health, self employment oriented training, vocational training and other miscellaneous and socio economic activities. in the field of education and health we have been running ALL Saints School since more than 12 years to provide under matric education to the children of underpriviledged community, running a college for medical education in alternative system of medicine (three and half years diploma course in biochemic system of medicine) since 2007 and recently we have been awarded with a community college approved by Indira Gandhi National University (IGNOU) New Delhito be run at Hinoo, Ranchi for imparting formal and vocational education to all the people of the community with the emphasis on underpriveledged community, from july 2009 session. we have given free coaching to needy candidates for employment in polic service and for teachers. we have also given coaching/training to candidates for railway, manking, IB ,insurance recrutment examination . during the year 2007-08 we have given coaching to 30 candidates under the free coaching for SC and OBC students for the year 2007-08. schdule of the central goverment under ministry of social justice and empowerment. we have arranged medical camps, health awareness programmes from time to time and are running medical OPDs in biochemic system of medicine. in recognition of the works of the society, Rastriya Shiksha Ratna cum Gold Medal Award was given to the secretary by IEDRA (Indian Economic Development and research Association) New Delhi.during national seminar in the year 2008held at new Delhi.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: We are serving the Nation & Society Since 1999. We are engage to Establish various Muslim Minority Institutions such as Medical / Engraining Dental Colleges etc with establishment of Hospitals and various Public utility Institutions for the Benefit of General Public, Specially for Muslim Minority and down Trodden Class & More. We are regularly Providing and Executing awareness programs and Work Shops on Various Subjects, such as Computer Literacy, Humane Trafficking , Health and Environment , Forest and Environment, Pollution and use of Gobar Gas / Bio Gas Plant to reduce the energy / Electric Consumption and Pressure on Govt. Bodies. We also provide Several Social Activities for the benefit of General Public & as well as the Government also. We like to do more and more Social works and Awareness Programs and establishment of various Technical, Medical, Engineering & Various Institutions with the help of Govt. fudging also. About College Of Nursing 1. We have already obtained No Objection Certified from State Govt. of Jharkhand, Ranchi. vide Letter No 94(74)dt.16.03.2009, with a Capacity of 100 (one Hundred) Intake for 18 (Eighteen) Month ANM Course Program At College of Nursing Giridih. 2. State Govt. of Jharkhand, Ranchi has already granted a proposal for Tie-up with Sadar (Distict) Hospital Giridih Vide Deptt of Health Medical Education and Family welfare, Ranchi letter No. 2- nUr  8-02/2002-27(2) dt. 23.3.2002 for Clinical Experience of our Dental / Nursing Student. 3.We have already obtained Tip-up / Permission for Rural / Community Health Training to our ANM Student at PH Centre, Bengabad, Giridih Vide his Letter No.-276 dt 19.04.2010. 4.We have already abstained Tip-up with Navjeevan Nursing Home (Hospital) Giridih for Clinical Experience to our Nursing Student vide his Letter No-Nil dt.- 23rd January 2002 & No.-Nil dt. 8.04.2010 5. We have already obtained Tip-up with Shree Vishwanath Nursing Home Barmasia Giridih vide dt. 06.05.2003. 6. ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Under child sponsorship program, ALIG is sponsoring the education of more than 125 children. Other than that it has trained more than 1500 women in stitching, embroidery and computer literacy. Under the health project, it is catering for 2634 adolescents (boys and Girls) in seven villages of east singhbhum district. Under vocational training program, it has reached more than 400 students and trained them in English and communication skills. Other than that it is also working closely with the government schools for English Leaning Enhancement program and targeting more than 1000 children in five schools. It has well equipped training center for women and girls for Stitching, embroidery, beautician and computer classes. It also has 9 resource centers, which is meant for the girls and boys between 12-19 years.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Support for this program was received from VisualBalance, a company based in Singapore. The program was aimed at digital literacy of the beneficiaries. This program targeted girl students going to school and college and appraise them about the importance of Digital Literacy in todays world. The program taught basics of computer and also how to search about government schemes on the internet and benefit from it.

This program was run in Kasturba Gandhi Balika Vidyalaya, Sundarnagar, Jamshedpur for four months. It was to strengthen the students in English language. Total of 50 students from class X was targeted.

This program was run in 8 Kasturba Gandhi Balika Vidyalayas of Purbi Singhbhum. Awareness was build among girls about the importance of career and subsequent plans after passing out from the school. Those who were weak in English were also given special classes to improve the language. More than 500 students participated in this program.

This program was supported by Chances for Children International, program aimed at improving digital literacy among the semi urban and rural women. This initiative was to support government initiative of Digital India.

The program was aimed for the girls studying in Kasturba Gandhi Balika Vindayala. Under this program girls were counselled about their career and those who were weak in English were given extra classes.

Health center is being run at Maharajganj to provide OPD services to the underprivileged population of the area. There is qualified doctors in the OPD for consultation. Patients could also get their tests done here.

This grant is to help the girls and women become digitally literate and become well versed in spoken English. This project is in alignment with current government vision to make India digitally literate.

OPD facilities with a team of qualified doctors is being run at Maharajganj to provide medical support to the underprivileged section of the society. The patients could also get their tests done at the center.

The purpose of the project is to make the women folks digitally literate and help improve their spoken English capacity. This program is exclusively for the women. Targeted section are those who are college going, house wives or those who have quit their studies. This program is in line with the vision of central government to make India digitally literate.
